description:
Simply put, King Law wins. Our law firm in Rochester, New York, has a proven track record of success in personal injury and criminal law cases. We routinely protect clients' futures by defending them in courtrooms and advocating for them in negotiations.

Our founder, Robert King, has personally won more than 500 criminal cases that range from misdemeanours to felonies. He is a former prosecutor who knows how to navigate the legal process. Our numbers speak for themselves: 85% of the felony charges we handle have been dismissed or reduced, with 174 criminal cases dismissed. We do everything we can to keep our clients out of jail and their reputations protected.

The attorneys at our law firm have earned recognition throughout the legal community for their accomplishments and work ethic. Their honors include the following:

• Being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100
• Holding an Avvo "Superb" rating
• Our attorneys being included to the list of being named a Super Lawyers Rising Star

Our law firm offers free initial consultations. We have someone available around the clock to speak to potential clients. Hiring us means having an experienced team on your side at every turn. We create a tailored plan for you that takes into account your particular circumstances and resources. King Law accepts credit cards.
